title: cloud compute environments
extract: Cloud computing environment is a new, great approach to providing IT-related services. ... In simple terms, cloud computing environment is all about IT and what IT needs: different kinds of software and hardware, pay-per-use or subscription-based services offered both through the Internet and in real time.
extract_html: Cloud computing environment is a new, great approach to providing IT-related services. ... In simple terms, cloud computing environment is all about IT and what IT needs: different kinds of software and hardware, pay-per-use or subscription-based services offered both through the Internet and in real time.
